channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AR

item.title: Report X-2023070139
item.description:
Report X-2023070139

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-28T15:11:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-29
  • City: MABELVALE
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE LEAKED INSIDE OF TRAILER AND WAS IMMEDIATELY GIVEN TO QA. DescribePack: FAILURE WAS DUE TO LOOSE CAP NOT BEING TIGHT DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PLACED IN HAZMAT TOTE LINED WITH PLASTIC HAZMAT BAG

item.title: Report X-2023061660
item.description:
Report X-2023061660

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-28T15:11:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-23
  • City: LOWELL
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: there is a defective lid seal. The box was overturned during transit and leaked. The leakage did not escape the outer box. The box was turned upright and placed in a hazmat bag and drum. DescribePack: Defective lid seal. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag and drum.

item.title: Report X-2023061659
item.description:
Report X-2023061659

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-25T15:12:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-23
  • City: LOWELL
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The lid had a faulty seal. slight leakage due to sloshing during transport. Leakage did not escape outer box. Package was placed in Hazmat bag and drum. DescribePack: faulty seal at lid. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: placed in hazmat bag and drum.
